title: Effect of natural organic matter (NOM) on the removal efficiency of Hg(II) by MoS2: dependence on the Hg/MoS2 ratio and NOM properties
content:
Environ. Sci.: Nano, 2024, 11,1129-1141
DOI: 10.1039/D3EN00730H, Paper
Mengxia Wang, Meng Zhang, Qi Han, Yufei Shu, Xun Liu, Beizhao Chen, Yuchao Chen, Bei Liu, Zhongying Wang
In groundwater, the efficiency of MoS2 nanosheets for Hg(II) removal is significantly hindered by natural organic matter (NOM) at high molar ratios of Hg/MoS2, whereas at low ratios, NOM has minimal impact on Hg(II) removal.
